title: 6.2 Master Challenge 1
question: Create a blank Excel file. Add the data for the most favorite rainbow color you collected at the beginning of the sprint, to it. Add the color names in one column and the number of people who like that color in the second column.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
